DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, non-comparative, open, observational study.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study on Efficacy of Alvesco(Ciclesonide) in Asthma Children and Adolescent in Real Practice
DOC.criteria: Children who is prescribed with ciclesonide for asthma Subjects with contraindications to ciclesonide use Subjects with clinically relevant concomitant disease that could compromise the patient's safety should not be included in this study.
